tool.name: Drugbank
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper for the Drugbank REST API.
tool.command:
#if $config.sele == "option1": ln -s -f ${config.properties} ${config.properties}.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
drugbank
#if $config.sele == "option1": --config ${config.properties}.${config.properties.ext} #else if $config.sele == "option2": --config '${config.jsonstr}' #else if $config.sele == "option3": --config "__oc____dq__drugbank_id__dq__:__dq__${properties.drugbank_id}__dq____cc__" #end if
--output_sdf_path $__new_file_path__/$outname_output_sdf_path ; #if $config.sele == "option1": rm -f ${config.properties}.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
if test -f $__new_file_path__/$outname_output_sdf_path; then mv $__new_file_path__/$outname_output_sdf_path $output_sdf_path; fi;

param.name: outname_output_sdf_path
param.label: output SDF name
param.help: Path to the output SDF component file Format: [output].sdf

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

inputs.section:
<param name="drugbank_id" type="text" label="drugbank_id" help="Drugbank component id." optional="true"
/>
